## R Markdown

```{r tidy = False}
Pennsylvania_Districts_LearningModelData_Clean<- Pennsylvania_Districts_LearningModelData_Final_2_ %>%
  select(StateName, DataLevel, DistrictName, DistrictType, Charter, LearningModel) %>% 
  mutate(LearningModel = replace_na(LearningModel, "None")) %>% 
  group_by(DistrictName, DistrictType) %>% 
  summarise(
    Virtual = sum(LearningModel == 'Virtual'),
    Hybrid = sum(LearningModel == 'Hybrid'),
    In_Person = sum(LearningModel == 'In-person'),
    .groups = 'drop'
  )
```
